thread.title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Appian reports Q4 loss of 11 cents per share (Feb. 22)

title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Appian reports Q4 loss of 11 cents per share (Feb. 22)
text: February 22, 2018 / 9:17 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Appian reports Q4 loss of 11 cents per share (Feb. 22) Reuters Staff 2 Min Read (In Feb. 22 Brief, corrects 6th bullet to loss per share forecast is 62-65 cents, not 53-54 cents, after company issues correction) Appian Corp: * APPIAN ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.11 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 50 PERCENT TO $50.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.17 TO $0.18 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.62 TO $0.65 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $198.1 MILLION TO $201.1 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 12 TO 14 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $46 MILLION TO $46.2 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 20 TO 21 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16, REVENUE VIEW $41.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.11, REVENUE VIEW $45.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.46, REVENUE VIEW $196.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Company's amended SEC filing with correct figures: bit.ly/2EPdonR Further company coverage:
